resources.string: This button is used to return to the home screen of the app
This button is used to open/close the menu that provides access to features such as the favourites list
This button is used to open/close the search bar
This search bar is used to find your manga

We used the MangaDex API outlined here: https://api.mangadex.org/docs.html

 Followed example for a custom ArrayAdapter here: https://abhiandroid.com/ui/custom-arrayadapter-tutorial-example.html

 Followed example for a search interface here: https://stuff.mit.edu/afs/sipb/project/android/docs/training/search/setup.html
